1.content:
The sun was setting down that evening as you walked down the sidewalk while passing people of humans and anthros alike as you headed towards Freddy Fazbear's Pizza to start your job there. Though you knew you didn't really need a job during the summer before starting going back to college for your third year since you were 21 yers old. But you figured having extra money wasn't a bad idea, and plus it could help you start to pay off a loan you had to get out when you started college. And usre you figured the pay wouldn't be the greatest, but even a bit of money was cetainly better then bothering your parents about the matter, even though you knew they'd hlep out if you asked them.

But you knew that you had to be independent at some point in your life. And what better time then now to do so as you took in a breathe of air once you reached the pizzeria. You then ran one of your hands through your bangs on yoru hair and told yourself, "Okay, you can do this, Chris. You're just going to be server here during the night shift. How hard could that be since this place closes at 9 and then 10 at night on Fridays and Saturdays?*

So after givng yourself a bit of a pep talk you placed your hand on the door handle and pulled it open and stepped inside. And upon doing so you looked on and saw that the small restaurant had tables all over the place and an arcade area, a stage where you saw the purple male rabbit named Bonnie, who was currently playing a light tune on his guitar and was only wearing a bow tie, and a pair of pants and a black vest which was currently close though that didn't do much to hide his heavily msucled body. You also noticed that his legs, and thighs seemed a bit tight in those pants, but not too tight to where he'd be uncomfortable or draw attention to himself. And every so often when you looked over at the doors that led into the kitchen you saw a yellow female chicken walk out and place various pizzas on a nearby table who was hearing a white shirt, black pants, along with an apron and chief's hat on her head.

And upon hearing some kids letting out some giggles you turned your head and saw a second stage to your right though this was much smaller and it had a few kids sitting in a circle while they listned to the anthro fox named Foxy, who was only wearing an eye patch over one of his eyes, and a pair of light brown pants, a brown pirate's coat, and white shirt you thought you saw from the lower part of his abed stomach. Though when he did some motions you saw that one of his hands been replaced by a hook. So this made you wonder if his stories that he told were perhaps true.

"Oh good, you're finally here." A voice said, which made you turn to face the person who was now in front of you.

Once you had done this you saw that the owner of the pizza franchise Freddy Fazbear was in front of you. And you could see right away that the muscle gutted brown furred bear was wearing a black suit which of ocurse included the top hat and bow tie. Though you did your best not to stare like what you hadn't done for the other two as you nodded your head and replied, "Yes, sir. I'm your new server. I belive on the phone a few days ago I told you my name was Chris?"

"of course, why else do you think I approached you? I figured you were my new employee or a patrown waiting to be seated." The bear cheerfully replied, before you saw one his large furry hands had extended out to you.

When you saw this you reached out to it and shook it. Though after you did this you saw a very large muscled gutted golden furred bear in his own black suit who was walking around in the background, and he seemed to be checking various things. And it would seem that Freddy saw you do this as he informed you, "Oh you're wondering about that big bear aren't you? His name is Golden Freddy, though he and I aren't related. He used to be used the former owner of this place before I brought it from it. But he stills likes to show up to see how I'm fairing running the business. And he is still in charge of small of the smaller diners that we own as well."

You nodded your head in understanding as you then followed Freddy to the back to change into your server uniform. Though you were informed that you wouldn't be serving very many people at night since most people left at reasonable hours. So you'd pretty much be in charge of getting people boxes if they wanted to take any slices of pizza home with them. Or get them any drinks or take home cups as well. And once the patroens were gone you'd then work a few hours after closing time to help clean up and get thrings ready for the next day. And all of that seemed easy enough.

So once you had changed and walked out into the main room of the pizzeria you did your job right away for about two hours which just flew by. And once the last sets of customers had left you were going to help clean up. But then the question was who'd hlep clean up since Freddy was busy cleaning tables and chairs. Golden Freddy was busy picking up any trash that might have fallen out of the wastebasket. Bonnie was busy putting away his guitar and other equipment while Foxy was busy checking his cove for anything that one of kids might have forgotten.

And once you had given it some thought you decided that you should go and help out....

You figured that you'd help out Foxy check around his Pirate's Cove. Sure checking if anything had been left behind by the kids might not be the most exciting thing to do. But considering he only had one hand you figured that giving two extra ones to reach for things would be better then nothing. And as you approached him you saw his wide muscled brown coated covered back facing you along with his longe bushy tail as it swayed from left to right above the pants covered outline of his two firm and muscled looking buttcheeks as he hummed a jig.

This cuased you to blush a little bit though you did your best to get rid of it as you cleared your throat and let out, "Um, excuse me, Foxy?"

After saying this you saw one of the anthro fox's ears twitch before he sharply turned around and pointed the end of his hook at you as he told you, "That be Cap'n Foxy, laddie!" Though once he saw you were wearing a uniform with a name tag on it his expression quickly changed while he added, "Oi, you're that new member of our crew aren't you? Chris, if me memory serves me correctly right?" To this you nodded your head as he kept going, "Well why didn't you say that from the start? I thought you were one of those youngsters wanting another tale from old Foxy."

"Wait if that's the case is that how you greet the kids?" You asked, a bit more then a little confused.

To this you saw the anthro fox shake his head from side to side before he replied, "No, no, most of the kids know to call me Cap'n Foxy or Captain Foxy, whichever they prefer." You then saw him cross his large muscled arm in front of his massive clothed pecs when he went on, "Now why you don't tell me why you came over to me cove, boy?"

"Erm well I was hoping ot help you check around it to see if any kids left anything behind." You explained, which you noticed caught the fox off guard a bit.

This didn't last long though as smile spread across his face as he responded with, "Really? That's awfully kind of you lad. Though remember that I'm the Captain here. So you listen to me when you're here in me Cove, got it?"

You nodded your head in understanding before the two of you got to work looking the stage of the Cove to see if any kids had left anything behind. And well nothing major had been left behind other then some tickets from the arcade machines and a few rings from any toy rings that some of the little girls may have been wearing. And once very part of the small stage had been checked the anthro fox lead you to the storage room where the lost and found box was located to put the items in until the next day.

And upon entering the room there wasn't much in it other hten a few boxes here and there one of them being the lost and found box. Though upon looking into it you noticed a funny looking gun instead of it. At first you thought it was a normal looking gun, though once you ahd pulled it out of the box you saw that it looked like some kind of laser or ray gun. But there's no way those were real, right?

And since you were so focused on examining the gun you found to notice that Foxy had come up from behind you and was looking over your shoulder since well all four of the anthros were a good foot or more taller then you were as he broke you out of your curiosity when he asked, "What did you find laddie?"

"O-Oh, I found htis funny looking gun. But I have no idea if it's works or not. For all I know this could just be some kind of toy or squirt gun." You explained, once you had turned to face the anthro fox.

"hmm, well how about you test out that odd gun on me?" Foxy suggested.

"Erm are you sure about that?" You asked, not sure how good of an idea this was.

To your surprise you saw the fox's hook tap on the gun while he pointed out, "Well if you look here it seems like there's different settings on this gun. So it must do something right?"

Upon hearing him say this you looked and in fact saw different setting on the gun Though it just seemed to have different colors on it ranging from blue to red. You weren't sure what that meant, but if it was a squirt gun at least the fox could just change his clothes. And so you swallowed a lump in your throat and pointed the odd gun at the anthro fox's clothed chest and pushed your finger onto the trigger and fired the gun which then shot a laser out of it and hit the six foot Foxy square in the chest for s few seconds. And once the laser was gone you saw that both the laser and the setting were set on the color.......

Green. Green was the color that the gun was set to. Though considering it seemed to be on the lowest setting you were hoping that Foxy wouldn't grow a whole lot. Though from the looks of it they seemed a little snug for some areas on his even more massively muscled furry body.

"Aye, it seems that it certainly does. Though I suppose I can't blame you for staring at me, boy." the anthro fox commented, now with a grin on his face. You then saw him flex an arm before he added, "Do ya have the hots for old Foxy?"

Upon letting this out though you heard the now seven foot fox let out a loud laugh before he walked up to you and placed his hand onto your shoulder and told you, "No need to be nervous lad. I was just jesting with ya."

"Aye, that's a good point lad. Though I guess you'll just have that gun with ya to grow my clothes for me. .....Unless there's a way to shrink me back to normal?" Foxy asked, while he tilted his head to the right a little.

This question actually made you curious as you hadn't thought of that being a setting on the gun. So you looked it from top to bottom and front to back. Sadly though from the looks of it, it didn't look like there was any way to reserve the affects of the gun.

And so you looked up at he anthro fox with a frown on your face as you told him, "Sadly it doesn't look like there's any way to reserve the growth. Though maybe I or a friend of mine might be able to fix add that to the gun when I find the time to really look at the gun more in-depth."

"Aye, then I'll leave it to you Chris. Until then let's go to me ship and make sure that my other clothes are the same size as this outfit." Fox suggested, as he moved his hand from your shoulder and onto your shoulder blade. AFter that you then saw him point his hooked hand in front of you both before he continued with, "So let's make this little trip an adventure shall we?"

Hearing this from the anthro fox prompted you to let out a light chuckle since you were glad that he wasn't really freaking out about this. Though he did only grew a foot in height. So who knows how he'd react if he gone any bigger then that. And so you both walked out of the storage room and turned off the lights and shut the door. After that you........

info.brief_description: You get a job at Freddy's. But when you find a ray gun there could be some BIG problems.
info.description:
Hello everyone and here's I am making another interactive story. This time based on Five Niths At Freddy's, but with a twist. That being that Freddy, Foxy, Bonnie, Chica, and Golden Freddy are all anthros and you the reader who's name is Chris, who lives in a world with both humans and anthros. And after getting a job at the pizza place you had gone to when you were a kid. However, when you and one of your anthro coworkers find a ray gun in the lost and found box while in the storage room. Well some BIG things might be coming if you aren't careful.

1. Only M/M interactive only.

2. Be careful how big you might grow one or all four of the four anthro guys since they won't be able to shrink back down. So the smallest you can have them grow up to is 10 feet and the biggest is 500 feet.

3. If one of the four or all four are giants, please do not have any gore, death or toilet stuff.

4. The growth can only happen/take place at night because well otherwise it'd cause a panic during the day.

5. Please try to use good grammar. Though I will fix any and all errors if there are any.

6. The clothes for the anthro guys MUST grow with them. Mostly since well if Foxy's hook is growing with him then it makes sense that everything else would grow too.

7. Have fun.
